text.p:
Appendix 2
RIOGHACHD ANIMALIA

2 . Buidheann Sarcodina
— — — Amoeba proteus — — —
( ag aobhrachadh dysentry )
Entamoeba histolytica ) — — —

3 . Buidheann Sporozoa
( ag aobhrachadh mailéiria )
Plasmodium vivax — — —

4 . Buidheann Ciliophora ( na cilichean )
— — — Paramecium caudatum — — —

B . Phylum Porifera ( spongan )
spong m . e . Leucosolenia ( iomadh seòrsa ) a purse sponge

1 . Buidheann Scyphozoa
muir - tèachd Aurelia aurita jelly fish

2 . Buidheann Anthozoa
cìoch na mnatha - sìthe ; cìoch na maighdinn - mhara m . e . Actinia equina sea anemone
corail m . e . Balanophyllia regia coral

3 . Buidheann Hydrozoa
— — — Hydra fusca — — —
liadhag Sertularia ( no Dynamena ) pumila sea - oak

D . Phylum Ctenophora ( cìrean - na - maighdinn - mhara )
sgeith - an - ròin Pleurobrachia pileus sea - gooseberry
E . Phylum Annelida ( daolagan sgarte )

1 . Buidheann Oligochaeta
cnuimh - thalmhuinn Lumbricus terrestris earthworm

2 . Buidheann Polychaeta
baoiteag m . e . Nereis diversicolor ragworm
luga , lungach Arenicola marina sea sandworm , lugworm

3 . Buidheann Hirudinea
deal , sumaire Hirudo medicinalis medical leech
F . Phylum Platyhelminthes ( daolagan réidhe )

1 . Buidheann Turbellaria
— — — Planaria alpina — — —

2 . Buidheann Trematoda
am pluc Fasciola hepatica sheep liver fluke ( causes sheep “ liver rot ” )

3 . Buidheann Cestoda
cnuimh - ribeineach Taenia solium pork tapeworm

G . Phylum Nematoda ( daolagan cruinne )
daolag chruinn Ascaris lumbricoides roundworm
— — — Heterodera rostochiensis potato eel - worm

1 . Buidheann Crustacea
cloitheag Crangon vulgaris shrimp
cathan Balanus balanoides acorn barnacle ( on rocks )
crùbag Carcinus maenas shore crab
gabhar Palinurus vulgaris spiny lobster , crayfish
giùran Lepas anatifera goose barnacle
giomach Homarus vulgaris lobster
carran m . e . Leander serratus common prawn
partan Cancer pagurus edible crab
partan - tuathal Eupagurus bernhardus hermit crab

2 . Buidheann Insecta ( Meanbh - fhrìdean )
carnan Blatta blatta cockroach
connspeach Vespa crabro hornet
corra - ghóbhlach ; fiolan - donn Forticula auricularia earwig
corr - mhial m . e . Aedes ; Anopheles ; Culex mosquito
cuileag chumanta Musca domestica housefly
cuileag mhór Calliphora erythrocephala blue - bottle fly
daol ; fairche — — — beetle
m . e . daolag - bhreac Coccinella hieroglyphica lady - bird beetle
dealan - dé m . e . Erebia aethiops butterfly ( m . e . the Scotch argus )
deargad ; deargann m . e . Ctenocephalides canis flea ( m . e . the dog flea )
fionnan - feòir m . e . Mecostethus grossus grasshopper
leòmann m . e . Lygris populata moth ( m . e . Northern spinach moth )
mial — — — louse , aphid , greenfly
m . e . mial - chon Trichodes canis dog - louse
mial - phonair Aphis fabae bean plant louse , bean aphid
cuileag - ghlas greenfly
seangan m . e . Formica sanguinea ant
seillean m . e . Apis mellifica bee ( m . e . honey - bee )
speach m . e . Vespa vulgaris wasp
tarbh - nathrach m . e . Libellula quadrimaculata dragonfly

3 . Buidheann Arachnida
breabadair Tipula subnodicornis daddy - longlegs

damhan - allaidh m . e . Lycosa nigriceps spider
fìneag Acarina ( iomadh seòrsa ) mite
cartan — — — a tick
m . e . mial - caorach Ixodes ricinus sheep - tick ( technically a mite )
sgairp m . e . Scorpio swammerdami scorpion

5 . Buidheann Diplopoda
corra - chòsag ; fiolan - mìle - chasach m . e . Iulus terrestris millipede
I . Phylum Mollusca ( maorach agus càirdean )

1 . Buidheann Gastropoda
bàirneach Patella vulgata common limpet
faochag Littorina littorea common winkle
faochag - mhór , cnocag Buccinum undatum common whelk , buckie
gille - fionn , conachag Nuceua lapillus common dog whelk
lugas m . e . Arion ater slug ( m . e . the black slug )
maighdealag Trivia monacha European cowrie
seilcheag m . e . Helix aspersa garden snail
lugas na mara m . e . Aeolidia papillosa common grey sea slug

2 . Buidheann Pelecypoda ( dà - mhogallaich — bivalves )
coilleag , clab - dubha Cardium edule common cockle
eisir Ostrea edulis native oyster
feusgan Mytilus edulis mussel
muirsgian Ensis siliqua pod razor shell
creach Pecten maximus great scallop

3 . Buidheann Cephalopoda
sguid Loligo forbesi common squid
octopus Eledone cirrhosa curled octopus
sùil - an - tòin , cudal Sepia officinalis common cuttle - fish

1 . Buidheann Crinoidea
— — — Antedon bifida feather star
( buinidh na lilidhean - cuain do ’ n bhuidhinn seo . Co - dhiù , tha a ’ mhór - chuid dhiubh air a dhol bàs , ach beagan tha beò ann am muir domhainn . )

2 . Buidheann Holothuroidea
— — — Cucumaria lactea a sea - cucumber

3 . Buidheann Echinoidea
gearra - bhoc ; crogan - feannaig ;
Echinus esculentus common sea - urchin
crogan - tràghad ; conan - mara

4 . Buidheann Asteroidea
crosgag , crois - na - tràghad Asterias rubens common starfish

5 . Buidheann Ophiuroidea
— — — Ophiura ( iomadh seòrsa ) brittle - star

K . Phylum Hemichordata ( daolagan - dearcain )
— — — Saccoglossus cambrensis — — —

a . Sub - phylum Urochordata ( Tunicata ) ( steallairean - mara )
— — — Ciona intestinalis — — —
1 . Os - bhuidheann Pisces ( iasg is ainmhidhean coltach ri iasg )

A . Buidheann Agnatha ( iasg gun ghéillean )
creathall Petromyzon marinus sea - lamprey

B . Buidheann Chondrichthyes ( iasg brisgeanach )
cearban — — — shark
cearban beag Cetorhinus maximus basking shark ( an dara iasg as motha th ’ ann )
gobag ; biorach Squalus acanthus dogfish
sòrn ; scarrag ; sgait ;
Raja clavata skate , common British
buachaill - an - sgadain thornback
tarbh - dallaig Carcharinus glaucus small blue shark
roc m . e . Mobula giorna horned - ray , devil - fish
cearban mór Rhincodon typicus whale - shark ( an t - iasg as motha th ’ ann )

C . Buidheann Placodermi ( iasg le pleatan craicinn )
( Tha iad gu léir air dol bàs )

1 . Fo - bhuidheann Choanichthyes
— — — Latimeria chalumnae ( a coelacanth ) — — —
iasg - sgamhain Protopterus aethiopicus African lungfish

2 . Fo - bhuidheann Teleostomi ( iasg le itean gathach )
adag Gadus aeglefinus haddock
as - chu Conger conger conger eel
bradan Salmo salar salmon
breac Salmo trutta brown trout
easgann Anguilla anguilla eel
gealag Salmo trutta sea - trout ( de ’ n aon seòrsa ri breac )
lèabag - ghlas Microstomus kitt lemon sole
lèabag - leathann Hippoglossus hippoglossus halibut
lèabag - mhòr ; lèabag - bhreac Pleuronectes platessa plaice
lèabag Platichthys flesus flounder
rionnach Scomber scombrus mackerel
sgadan Clupea harengus herring
trosg Gadus morrhua cod
2 . Os - bhuidheann Tetrapoda
A . Buidheann Amphibia

( i ) Order Urodela ( Caudata )
salamander m . e . Amphiuma means salamander
dearc - luachrach Triturus vulgaris smooth newt

( ii ) Order Anura
losgann Rana temporaria frog
màgach ; maol - mhàgain ; muile - mhàg Bufo bufo toad

B . Buidheann Reptilia
laghairt Lacerta vivipara common lizard
crogall Crocodilus niloticus African crocodile
nathair — — — snake
m . e . nathair - nimhe Vipera berus adder
plàigh - shlat Anguis fragilis blind or slow worm ( a legless lizard )
sligeanach m . e . Testudo sumeiri Marion ’ s tortoise
turtur , calman , muir - seilche m . e . Caretta caretta m . e . atlantic loggerhead turtle
ailigeutair Alligator mississippiensis American alligator
C . Buidheann Aves ( eòin )

b . Fo - bhuidheann Neornithes ( eòin an là an diugh )
brù - dhearg Erithacus rubecula robin
cailleach - oidhche m . e . Asio flammeus short - eared owl
cearc Gallus domesticus hen
clamhan Buteo buteo buzzard
comhachag Tyto alba barn owl
cuthag Cuculus canorus cuckoo
fachach Fratercula arctica puffin
iolair mhonaidh Aquila chrysaetos golden eagle
iolair uisge Pandion haliaetus osprey
ostrais Struthio camelus ostrich
seabhag — — — hawk
m . e . coileach seabhaig Falco tinnunculus kestrel
m . e . seabhag ghorm Falco peregrinus peregrine falcon
D . Buidheann Mammalia

a . Fo - bhuidheann Prototheria ( mamailean tha breith uighean )
platypus gob - tunnaige Ornithorhynchus anatinus duckbill platypus
seangan - itheadair druimneach Tachyglossus aculeatus Australian spiny ant - eater , Australian Echidna

b . Fo - bhuidheann Metatheria ( mamailean le poc )
opossum Didelphis marsupialis Virginia opossum
cangaru ( dearg )
Macropus rufus red kangaroo
mathan koala Phascolarctos cinereus koala bear
c . Fo - bhuidheann Eutheria ( mamailean le plaseanta )

1 . Order Insectivora
cràineag ; gràineag Erinaceus europaeus hedgehog
dallag - an - fhraoich Sorex araneus common shrew
famh Talpa europaea mole
fiolan - feòir ; fionnag - feòir Sorex minutus lesser shrew
Neomys fodiens water shrew
fionnag - craoibhe Tupaia glis tree shrew

2 . Order Chiroptera
ialtag Pipistrellus pipistrellus common bat or
pipistrelle

3 . Order Carnivora
broc Meles meles badger
cat Felis catus cat
cat - fiadhaich Felis silvestris wild - cat
cù Canis familiaris dog
dóbhran , biast - dhubh Lutra lutra otter
each - mara Odobenus rosmarus walrus
feocullan Mustela putorius polecat
( tha an neas - abhag ( ferret ) a ’ tighinn bho ’ n fheocullan )
leómhann Panthera leo lion
liopard , onnchu Panthera pardus African leopard
madadh - allaidh , faol Canis lupus wolf
madadh - ruadh , sionnach Vulpes vulpes red fox
math - ghamhainn Ursus arctos brown bear
neas Mustela nivalis weasel
neas - bheag Mustela erminea stoat
ròn Phoca vitulina common seal
taghan Martes martes pine martin
tìgear Panthera tigris tiger
hièana Hyaena striata striped hyaena
mongus Herpestes edwardsi Indian mongoose

4 . Order Perissodactyla
asal Equus asinus asinus donkey
each Equus caballus horse

5 . Order Artiodactyla
càmhal Camelus bactrianus two humped camel
caora Ovis aries sheep
crodh Bos taurus cattle
damh Bos primigenius wild ox , urus , auroch
earba Capreolus capreolus roe - deer
fiadh Cervus elaphus red deer
gobhar , meann Capra hircus goat , kid
lon , os Alces alces elk , moose
muc Sus scrofa pig
reinfhiadh Rangifer tarandus reindeer
torc - nimhe Sus scrofa wild boar
sioraf Giraffa camelopardalis giraffe
Antilocapra americana pronghorn antelope

6 . Order Cetacea
deilf Delphinus delphis common dolphin
mada - chuain , leumnach Orchinus orca grampus , killer whale
muc - mhara m . e . Balaena glacialis Atlantic right whale
péileag , muc - bhiorach , muc - steallain Phocaena phocaena porpoise
rorcual Balaenoptera physalus common rorqual

7 . Order Proboscidea
ailp Loxodonta africana African elephant

8 . Order Rodentia
buaidh - iomlan Microtus agrestis short tailed field vole
coineanach , rabaid Oryctolagus cuniculus rabbit
dobhar - chu , cù - odhar Castor fiber beaver
feòrag Sciurus vulgaris red squirrel
luch Mus musculus house mouse

luch - fheòir , fiolagan Apodemus sylvaticus field mouse
feasgar - luch

maigheach , geàrr Lepus europaeus brown hare
maigheach - gheal Lepus timidus alpine , blue or Scottish hare
radan Rattus norvegicus brown rat
radan - dubh Rattus rattus black rat
radan - uisge , badalan Arvicola amphibius water rat , water vole

9 . Order Primates ( Prìomhaidean )
apa — — — ape
duine Homo sapiens man
goirilla Gorilla gorilla beringei mountain gorilla
siompansidhe Pan troglodytes chimpanzee monkey
moncaidh m . e . Macaca mulatta rhesus monkey
lèamur Lemur macaco black lemur
